text: The 2011 Eurocup Basketball Finals was the concluding Final Four tournament of the 2010–11 Eurocup Basketball season. The event was held at Treviso in Italy from April 16 and 17, 2011.Treviso, Italy to host Eurocup Finals! ==Bracket== ==Semifinals== ==Third place game== ==Final== ==References== ==External links== *Final Four Website Category:2010–11 Eurocup Basketball 2011 Category:2011 in Italian sport Category:International basketball competitions hosted by Italy
title: 2011 Eurocup Basketball Final Four
